mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspCtgry Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ DSP_CTGRY_NO , UPPER_DSP_CTGRY_NO , DSP_CTGRY_NM , STT_CTGRY_NM , CTGRY_TP_CD , CTGRY_SECT_CD , STRTGY_CTGRY_ATRB_CD , GOD_DSP_UNIT_CD , CTGRY_DPTH_CD , DSP_GOD_SORT_STDR_CD , LEAF_CTGRY_YN , DSP_YN , SPCIFY_URL_DSP_YN , CTGRY_DIV_LNE_YN , CTGRY_DIV_LNE_CSS_CD , DELETE_YN , CTGRY_OUTPT_TP_CD , OUTPT_SECT_CD , OUTPT_LINK_URL , SORT_SEQ , APL_MALL_ID , DSP_BRND_ID , EXPSR_LVL_CD , EXPSR_TGT_CD , PC_LIST_EXPSR_CNT_CD , MOBILE_LIST_EXPSR_CNT_CD , LIST_EXPSR_IMG_TURN , RPRST_IMG_FILE_NM , RPRST_IMG_FILE_URL , RPRST_IMG_ALTRTV_CONT , BCRN_STYLE_CLASS_ID , META_SJ_NM , META_DSCR_CONT , META_KWD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_CTGRY WHERE 1 = 1 AND DSP_CTGRY_NO = #{dspCtgryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteDspCtgry Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM DSP_CTGRY WHERE 1 = 1 AND DSP_CTGRY_NO = #{dspCtgryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
